attributes.action: Fix & resolve failings of LA's processing procedures of EHCP's for SEN Children
attributes.additional_details: My daughter has an EHCP its not sufficient. The review was in July 17 response time has lapsed. Before I can get more assessments & appeal  I need the completed review returned. I will soon need to apply for secondary school & if I do not have the correct updated legal info she will not get the help she needs. The LA's have a legal obligatory duty of care that was set by the government. They are not adhering to the rules, regulations and procedures in the majority of cases brought to them.
attributes.background: SEN kids need EHCP's. Each submission new or review has a 20 week process time. We ensure paperwork is complete and returned within  time frame given but LA's do not follow suit. Every school & parent says the same. ALL have urgent needs as SEN kids NEED additional support due to their disabilities.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you've made a complaint to the council, and you're not satisfied with how it's been handled, you may be able to complain to the Local Government Ombudsman. You can find out more here:

https://www.lgo.org.uk/
